item.title: Ukraine and Europe Chafe at Being Excluded From U.S.-Russian Peace Plan
item.description: Some in Kyiv expressed confusion over the Trump administration’s multiple diplomatic tracks as Washington tries to revive negotiations.

item.title: The Hunt Is On for Bears in Japan After Deadly Attacks
item.description: Residents in the northern region of Akita are living in fear after dozens of assaults on humans. Riot police and the army have been sent to help.

item.title: Trump Meeting With Saudi Prince Showcased Prince’s Makeover, and America’s
item.description: Mohammed bin Salman was briefly a global pariah after the killing of a Saudi dissident. But he has rebuilt his image as a deal-maker and influential i...

item.title: Israeli Strikes Kill at Least 25 in Gaza Amid Cease-Fire, Officials Say
item.description: Israel’s military said it had launched attacks across Gaza after Palestinian militants shot at its troops. The six-week-old cease-fire has been pierce...

item.title: Ferry Crashed After Operator Was Distracted by His Phone, Officials Say
item.description: The operator and two other officers were charged with gross negligence after the ferry ran aground in South Korea on Wednesday carrying 267 people.
